title: Purpose
context: ARTICLE 21 HAWAII PROPERTY INSURANCE ASSOCIATION Cross References Hawaii hurricane relief fund, see chapter 431P. [ยง431:21-101] Purpose. The purpose of this article is to establish the Hawaii Property Insurance Association to: (1) Assure stability in the property insurance market for property located in the State; (2) Assure the availability of basic property insurance as defined by this article; and (3) Provide for the equitable distribution among member insurers of the responsibility for insuring qualified property for which basic property insurance cannot be obtained through the authorized insurers. [L 1991, c 284, pt of ยง2]
